question: Do both an Austrian alpine ski racer active in the early 2000s and a Chilean film editor and director who worked closely with a major auteur belong to the same profession?
llm_answer:
No.  
The Austrian alpine ski racer is an athlete, whereas the Chilean film editor and director (Valeria Sarmiento) is a filmmaker; they do not share the same profession.
